title: Loudspeakers at mosques: Take legal action against MNS chief for ‘instigating’ Muslims, says SDPI - The Indian Express
content:
1. Loudspeakers at mosques: Take legal action against MNS chief for ‘instigating’ Muslims, says SDPI  The Indian Express
  2. MNS to Perform 'Maha Aarti' on Mike, Guj HC Asks Govt to Clear its Stand on Azaan Row: Latest on Loudspeake  News18
  3. Maharashtra Government To Allow Loudspeakers At Religious Sites Only With 'Due Permission'  Republic World
  4. Centre security to some individuals encroaches state govt rights: Maharashtra Home Minister  The Indian Express
  5. SDPI condemns Raj Thackeray’s statement against loudspeakers at mosques  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: During a press conference in Pune, Azhar Tamboli, general secretary of the SDPI’s Maharashtra unit, accused “secular parties” of inaction on the statements issued by Raj Thackeray and called for a boycott of iftar dinners hosted by such parties.
